title: Clean cuisine
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), John Budd and Mike O'Donnell
brief_description: An episode of ‘Countrywide’ where reporter Jill Singer examines the use of chemicals in Australian farming and the consequences of the presence of chemical residues in our food products.
